metadata.Description: Financial services that are accessible and affordable to all individuals and businesses, including those in underserved and marginalized communities.

level 1.Description: Digital inclusive finance employs mobile banking to provide financial services to underserved populations.
Digital inclusive finance collaborates with microfinance institutions to expand access to financial resources for marginalized communities.
Digital inclusive finance supports entrepreneurship by providing financial resources and business development services.
Digital inclusive finance administers social impact bonds to fund social projects and measure their outcomes.
Digital inclusive finance measures financial inclusion by tracking the number of individuals with access to formal financial services.
Digital inclusive finance aligns with the Sustainable Development Goals to promote economic growth and reduce inequality.
Digital inclusive finance is an instance of inclusive finance that aims to provide financial services to all segments of society.

level 2.Subject: energy entrepreneurship
level 2.Description: Energy entrepreneurship implements rigorous building standards that promote the use of energy-saving designs and materials.

level 2.Subject: energy entrepreneurship
level 2.Description: Energy entrepreneurship focuses on improving energy access in underserved communities through innovative solutions.

level 2.Subject: digital inclusive finance
level 2.Description: Digital inclusive finance employs mobile banking to provide financial services to underserved populations.

level 2.Subject: digital inclusive finance
level 2.Description: Digital inclusive finance collaborates with microfinance institutions to expand access to financial resources for marginalized communities.

level 3.Subject: energy markets
level 3.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

level 3.Subject: energy efficiency
level 3.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

level 3.Subject: energy poverty indices
level 3.Description: Energy poverty indices implement energy access programs to provide affordable and reliable energy services to underserved communities.

level 3.Subject: energy entrepreneurship
level 3.Description: Energy entrepreneurship implements rigorous building standards that promote the use of energy-saving designs and materials.
